channel.title: Help me get ice blitz to work plz

item.title: Help me get ice blitz to work plz
item.dc:creator: @wyatt1991 wyatt1991
item.description:
@wyatt1991 wrote:

break; case 51058: if (playerLevel[6] > 81) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)) && (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 3))) { NextCast="Ice Blitz"; println("Case 185: "+playerName+" Enabled Ice Blitz"); setSidebarInterface(0,328); } else if ((!playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)) || (!playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)) || (!playerHasItemAmount(555, 3))) { sendMessage("You don't have the required runes to cast that spell!"); } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 81) { sendMessage("You don't have the required level to cast that spell!");

y wont it work it has gfx but npcs dont get hit with it

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get ice blitz to work plz
